name: 007 sarandib
description:
seven of twelve images, created on the same day. they refelct my process of that day - allowing chance to enter into the conversation, so to speak - i did my best to not think about what i was doing.
serendipity - sarandib was the medieval arabic name for sri lanka and the root of the word serendipity
these works combine my love of chance and longings for a distant land, a foreign mystery.
